en.title: Image Watermark Web
en.uploadWarn: Notice: The uploaded image will be stored on our server. Please consider carefully before uploading.
en.burnAfterReadingText: If you check "Burn After Reading", your uploaded image and the watermarked image will be deleted within two minutes after processing is completed. Please download them in time.
en.previewNote: Only the first 3 images are previewed, the remaining {rest} will be processed

404.title: Image Deleted
404.imageDeletedMessage: Sorry, the image you requested has been deleted or does not exist.

zh.title: 边框水印
zh.uploadWarn: 注意：上传的图片会被存储在我们的服务器上，请您自行斟酌。
zh.burnAfterReadingText: 若您勾选“阅后即焚”，您上传的图片以及添加水印的图片将在处理完成两分钟内被删除，请您及时下载。
zh.downloadImage: 下载已添加水印的图片
zh.previewNote: 仅展示前 3 张图片预览，剩余 {rest} 张将一并处理

404.title: 图片已删除
404.imageDeletedMessage: 抱歉，您请求的图片已被删除或不存在。
